mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "This Ole House", "Leave 'Em Alone", "When You Wore a Tulip", and "Dutch Treat (Quadrille)" ROUND DANCES "Waltz of the Roses" and "Third Man Theme" SPECIAL FEATURES "Blueprint for a Successful Festival", "Style Series: Old Timer Less Awkward", "Square Dancing Fun for the Young 'Uns", "Democracy in Action", "A Corner of Kansas", and "Convention Bulletin". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
